name: VuardiansDAO
description: We are Vuardians. the believers, followers and guardians of Vitalik.Buterin and Ethereum, All supporters of Vitalik Buterin and Ethereum who donate to his new book "Proof of Stake" will receive our airdrop governance token worth 10,000,000 Posp each. Let's all come together as crypto-punks to improve the world, starting with Vitalik's book.
payDisclosure: Make sure you want to follow Vitalik
